name: Precision Dual Ended Sculpting Brush
about: What it is: A dual-ended contour brush that applies both creams and powders, sculpting and blending with ease for a softly defined look...Brush Formulation: All Formulas..Brush Coverage: Buildable..Brush Handle Length: 5..Bristle Type: Synthetic..Ingredient Callouts: This product is vegan and cruelty-free...What Else You Need to Know: The perfect tool to add soft definition to your cheekbones, jawline, and hairline, this dual-ended brush has both an angled, fan-shaped head and a fluffy powder head, allowing you to apply any formula you like while sculpting and shaping with ease...
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Use the angled end to apply cream and to shape and define. .-Dust powder bronzer on with fluffy end, setting, blending, and bronzing where desired.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This brush is versatile and handles both powder and cream formulas which creates a flawless finish.  I used the larger end of the brush for powder application and swept it across the apples of my cheeks and blended upwards toward my temples. The bristles picked up just the right amount of blush, distributing it evenly for a softer focused airbrushed look.   I used the shorter end of the brush for the cream blush. It worked beautifully and the product into my skin. My complexion looked dewy and had a radiant glow too.  I also applied the product to my nose and sides of my forehead for a natural look.   I loved how the bristles were soft and smooth against my skin.  I cleaned them and there was no loss of shape or shedding of the bristles.  The gold handle was luxurious. It traveled well and works wonderful for applying bronzer too.  It is convenient for using for more than one product! I love having a product that does more than one job!  This review was collected as part of a promotion.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I prefer the size of the original contour brush but itu2019s only available on Patrick Tau2019s website. This is a great alternative & Iu2019m happy with my purchase

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The brush is a good quality but itu2019s just SO BIG for sculpting and contouring.  Never use it anymore.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Great for cheeksufffc and contouring around cheeks or under jawline. I've also used the small end to sweep highlighter over my brow bone and after my brows. I'm not sure if it was intended to be used with cream products but it's good for both cream and powder products. ufffc

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Brush literally falls out on your face and is not durable at all.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The brush is WAY too big for most peoples faces. Itu2019s really not worth the money and donu2019t believe anyone who says u201comg this changed my lifeu201d u201cyou need this!u201d Is overreacting. Like- itu2019s just a brush. (Patrick has also been in a lot of controversies and after looking into it I personally wouldnu2019t support him)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I just got this a few days ago so I donu2019t know how well it will hold up but, this is the best brush I have ever used for contour ever. I probably have over 100 brushes and this is in my top 3 for sure.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Meh, the double-ended brush is hard to store and is nothing to write home about. If I had tried it in-store I would have just gotten a sephora brand brush instead.

reviews.review_text: i heard so many good things about this brush, it wasnu2019t terrible and gets the job done, but unless you use a pot contour or bronzer, itu2019s not for you, i use mbm stick contour and itu2019s so hard to blend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: As a makeup addict I was late to the game on this brush and trying out the Patrick ta products , after finally getting some items I now realize I have missed out in life ..: this brush is absolutely amazing ! Definitely worth the money !

reviews.review_text: I LOVE this brush. This changed my makeup game and totally improved it. If you are just beginning with high end brushes and want to get just one, get this one!

reviews.review_text: I have a lot of brushes and I definitely expect shedding to a degree for almost all of them but this one was the most baffling as it quite literally came out in chunks after one gentle wash. Not durable enough for the price!

The bristles are coming out in chunks.  I do like using it with all Patrick Ta products and Hours glass.

reviews.review_text: So convenient its a two in one, plus the sculpting part of the brush is just perfect when it comes to contour !

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Love this dual brush! I love that all Patrick Ta product beautifully designed and easy to use. These brush are perfect to use with Bronzer Duo by PT as well.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Patrick ta brushes never disappoint! This is such a high quality brush and I love that it is dual ended! One side is perfect for cream products for sculpting, while the fluffier side is perfect for powder products! Because of its two in one, it is the perfect brush for travel!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Loved this dual brush. I love using one end to contour and define, and the other to blend amd diffuse. Works great with both powders and cremes. Perfect for my Contour, Bronzers and Blushes. Ordering more for my pro-MUA kit.

reviews.review_title: You canu2019t find a better brush duo than this
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The ideal brush duo! The bristles are strong but very soft. One end is ideal for blending out powder, and it makes applying and blending out creme products a breeze. The more compact, tapered side was the ideal shape to gently place product where I needed it. It worked wonders for contouring and bronzing. I was able to diffuse the product out beautifully using the angled, fluffier end, which picked up just the right amount of product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Im very impressed with this makeup brush. Feels and look luxurious which I absolutely love. It helps me to apply the cream easily and it helps me shape my face beautifully with the contour. This is worth it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: The perfect brush duo! The bristles are extremely soft but sturdy. It makes so easy to apply and blend out the cream product (I use the Patrick ta bronzer duo) and the other end is perfect to blend out the powder. I highly recommend this duo brush.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I am not an expert at contouring but this really helped me.  The fine side made contouring easy.  The fluffy side made blending the bronzer seamless.  I highly recommend.  10/10

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is my first Patrick Ta brush, and Iu2019m wowed. First, the bristles, which are vegan, feel like real hairu2014thereu2019s even variations in the bristle colors that contribute to it having a very realistic look and feel. I had to keep rechecking the website that these were synthetic bristles, because theyu2019re so incredibly soft and fluffy. Using these to contour/bronze was incredible, the more compact, tapered side was the perfect shape to get into the contours of my face, and to gently place product where I needed it. The angled, fluffier end was great in the powder, it picked up the perfect amount of product from the pan and then I was able to diffuse it out very nicely. You can tell they really thought about the way these brushes would work together, because they compliment each other so well. Youu2019ll definitely enjoy having these in your routine.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I never knew I could love a brush this much until this one! Very soft and defined especially the fan-shaped end which is perfect for my nose contour! I love to use the fluffy side for my cheeks and it also works amazingly for blush application :)

reviews.review_title: probably one of the softest brushes !
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019m not saying you u201cneedu201d this brush but you kinda need to at least check it out if available in stores. Such a convenient brush especially while traveling since itu2019s a dual-ended oneud83dude4cud83cudffc so soft !

reviews.review_title: This is your sign to buy this contour brush
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I'm the first to admit that I've used the same bronzer brush long past its lifetime. Despite being a bit loose, I always thought that it did a decent job and didn't NEED to be replaced. The second I pulled this sculpting brush out of the packaging though, I knew I was so, so wrong. The bristles on this brush are incredibly soft, densely packed, and as the name implies- very precise, even given the brush is larger since it is meant for the face. I snapped these pictures as soon as I unboxed because I wanted to capture her beauty before getting into product. My favorite side is the thinner + longer side meant for a cream contour. I'd resorted to using my fingers to get my cream in the right place, but I'm so happy I can use this brush and keep my fingers clean (and not get contour all over my face!). The saying is true, an artist is only as good as her tools and this is a MUST HAVE for anyone struggling to quickly and effectively apply bronzer/contour on a daily basis.

reviews.review_title: One brush that does it all
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a multi purpose brush, I not only use for contour and bronzing but also use it apply my brush especially when I am on the go. It is perfect brush with a nice angle to get the most beautiful sculpted look. The brush in itself speaks quality, it is in a beautiful good color with a heavy base and super soft brush, which is soft enough to not scratch my face yet sturdy enough to maintain that angle. Absolutely love it, will try more from the collection.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Patrick Ta brushes have me running back to try more - and this one was no different. I packed this in my bag while traveling and used it with the Major Sculpt Contour & Bronzer Duo. The bristles are high quality and I haven't experience any shedding with vigorous use. Additionally, they feel so soft on your skin and the dual purpose feature is so worth it!

reviews.review_title: A dual ended brush I can get behind!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I don't typically go for dual ended brushes, but this one I actually love! I've tried the Major Sculpt brush as well, but I can see myself reaching for this one more now.  The smaller end is perfect for cream contour/bronzer, and the fluffier end is perfect for powder bronzer on top.  Patrick Ta absolutely nails it will the brushes - this is a new staple!

reviews.review_title: Best contour brush on the market
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is literally the best brush Iu2019ve ever used for contour. I never use to know how to apply contour & how to get the contour line so precise but this brush makes it so easy.

reviews.review_title: You need this brush in your collection!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: The quality is superb! the brush works perfect for cream and powder products, blends product flawlessly with no streaks. It is beginner friendly and helps create the perfect sculpted look when contouring. Highly recommend!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: you need this brush!!!! It is a must for contouring. It picks up the cream and powder so nicely and this brush allows you to apply it at the right angle seamlessly. It blends out the product so perfect giving you the best glow you ever had!

reviews.review_title: You need this for contour - A MUST!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This brush was very easy to use and made using cru00e8me and powder contour so fun! It grabs onto the product so weu2019ll, a little goes a long way!

reviews.review_title: Itu2019s perfect dual and sturdy brush
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: In love this dual ended sculpting brush. This brush is make my life easier and blend so well with the bronze duo.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: loved the original and now really love the updated dual ended brush for contour. itu2019s so beautiful the way it works and how it looks. 10/10

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: WOW, this definitely stepped up my bronzer brush game. Will be using this from now for my everyday bronzer brush. Loved it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This stunning brush applies the Patrick Ta Major Sculpt Creme Contour & Powder Bronzer Duo beautifully. The more precise end is perfect for applying the cream formula, and the fluffier end is perfect for applying the powder formula. The bristles are super soft!  The rose gold handle is stunning but not durable, as it somehow got scratched before I even had a chance to use it. Double-ended brushes are also difficult to store without damaging one end.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019m so glad this brush came out because it is a perfect two in one. You can use the fluffier end for the powder for a natural looks and the more dense side for the contour which places the product nicely to adult the cheek bones.

reviews.review_title: A perfect companion to the PT contour duo
reviews.review_buyer_description: Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love the original contour brush and this is a wonderful update. The angled contour brush works really well with any contour product but especially the Patrick Ta cream. I love that the brush is now dual ended with a fluffier side for the powder. It makes sense and means I only need this brush now not two separate. I love it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: great brush for applying the cream contour bronzer, i like patting in cream using the shorter side and powder with the fluffy side

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The quality is excellent. The brush is super soft. It applies both cream and powder contour beautifully blended. I love me a good double brush.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Makes applying contour and bronzer such a breeze! I love how soft and good quality the brush is, and in addition to that, it is super sturdy. It picks up just the right amount of product for application. This brush is unique, and definitely would recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Gray eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This brush is just fabulous! The bristles on both sides are heavenly smooth. The contouring side is pretty dense which makes sculpting effortless. The bronzer brush is really fluffy and works great for any powder textured products. Iu2019m pretty sure Iu2019ll use it for my setting powder as well.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is my new favorite bronzer brush! I love how precise the pinched side of the brush is. It makes applying contour so much easier and the big side of the brush is great for really getting a glow to your skin and not applying too much product. I highly recommend this dual sided brush! You will not be disappointed. Itu2019s high quality, a gorgeous brush, and works great!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Love this duo ended sculpting brush. It is travel friendly when you donu2019t want to carry so many brushes! The bristles are soft and are great quality. Perfect for both cream and powder products. Blends cream and powder so effortlessly. Pairs perfectly with the Patrick Tau2019s MAJOR SCULPT CRu00c8ME CONTOUR & POWDER BRONZER DUO. Also check out their new shades!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This brush is amazing. I usually donu2019t go for double ended brushes, but Patrick Ta brushes are the exception. Itu2019s super soft and the contour side is the perfect density and size to keep the contour precise but still blended into fused. The larger side is over er for diffusing the bronzer. I love that when I get Patrick Ta products I feel like Iu2019m always getting two products for the price of one and the quality is always exceptional.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This brush makes contouring fool proof! The stiff side is perfect for laying down and blending any cream and the angled side is so soft and picks up just enough color. I love having all of my sculpting tools in 1 component.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This brush is beautiful! It applies both cream and powder seamlessly without looking muddy or patchy. Both sides are soft and so easy to use, on top of being the perfect shape too. I highly recommend it for all your creams and powders!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The brush's quality is honestly really good! there's weight to it and the dual-ended sides leave room for different techniques. I used the thinner side for my forehead and nose and the other bigger side to blend out my cheekbones! gave a great airbrushed look and I combined it with his contour palette for a gorg bronzy look!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Love this! So soft and fluffy. The fluffier side blends the powder bronzer exceptionally. The thiner side for contour makes it foolproof to contour. Highly recommend it if youu2019re looking for a new brush!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This double ended brush is so soft and works perfectly for contour.  One end is slightly firmer for creams and the other end is fluffy for powders.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love how soft this brush is! The smaller side fits perfectly under my cheekbones to give me the perfect sculpt. My only complaint is that the larger end is a bit too big and can be hard to control. I wish it was a tad smaller.

reviews.review_title: Good brush, gets the job done.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The contour side of the brush is not the same as his original contour brush. Itu2019s not as dense and the itu2019s shape is thinner than its predecessor. I much prefer the first one, than this, but it still gets the job done. The bronzer side is soft and applies the product so nicely without it looking patchy. Love the brush overall though. I wish he kept the same bristle and shape from his predecessor. Will still continue to use though.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Literally the only brush you need for contouring. It makes application SO easy and simple. Soft and incredibly high quality.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've never been great at contouring but this brush makes it SO easy! So soft and blends effortlessly

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: If you've ever used Patrick Ta's brushes, you know what a game changer they are and this new sculpting brush is nothing less than! I used to think dual ended brushes were hard to use, but this makes applying the sculpt duos even easier and quicker - I love having a dedicated side for the bronzer now!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Oily skin
reviews.review_text: the easiest brush for contour and bronzer. never using another brush again! the shape makes it so easy to apply! get this brush. you won't be disappointed
